Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Paradise1982
Reviews.Content: barcelona friends weekend stayed hotel choose cheap actually shocked beautiful bathroom stylish continental breakfast price self service eat hotel aroud minute busy la rambla avenue definately recomend hotel free shower gels soaps towels toothbrushes razors hairdryer

Reviews.Title: “Cheap”
Reviews.Author: kazandlee
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed 2009 5 days hotel basic clean breakfast basic basement enjoyed beer vending machine near reception 1 euro accompanied kfc dinner wouldnt stay am staying 45 star accommodation ideal looking sleep dont mind basics hotel central barcelona heard noise window faced onto wall near hotel looks restaurantbar called restaurante los rotisserie chicken outside display busy recommend unfortunately couldnt seat dinner enjoyed sitting bar drink entertained barman people watching

Reviews.Title: “Exccelent for your money!”
Reviews.Author: Renata K
Reviews.Content: barcelona stayed hotel friends booked cause star expect cause wasnt 3 beds desk chair wardrobe little balcony goes noisy street top floor itd noice apart location perfect value money

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Location! So inexpensive & worth it!!”
Reviews.Author: WhatsUpBuddy
Reviews.Content: july friend am sooo happy stayed basic little beds tiny balcony hell cares youre location perfect las ramblas short walk beach literally plaza cool square restaurants bars etc 10 minute walk plaza catalyuna tour buses earlier checkin luckily ready elevator cares people luggage fit basic breakfast usually werent awake anyway towels everyday overall price location hotel awesome im love barcelona id definitely stay visit

Reviews.Title: “GREAT VALUE FOR MONEY”
Reviews.Author: mandymoofriend
Reviews.Content: 5 star hotel five star hotel paid spent week location fantastic trouble night feel unsafe breakfast choice til dinner stayed noise unbearable til hours move window overlooking courtyard middle building little smelly warm paid ammount time spent

Reviews.Title: “Dont stay here. Very Very Bad.”
Reviews.Author: Holidaysabraoadlover
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights hotel reception basic situated corner damp alley warned walking night dangerous recommend travel block path whilst walking offering delights floor lift stair access key cards occasion door lock day luckily valuable hidden balcony rail window door lock missing handle included single beds bathroom shower dribble hair washing impossible plug sockets available women hair straightners dryers chargers easy due lack electricity supply bed sheets changed beds stay looked blood stains sheets pubic hair luckily towels bathroom shoved bday cover sheets lastly worst aspect hotel poor breakfast selection day food morning crossaints bread rolls cornflakes served tea cup bowls orange juice horrible yoghurt looked smelt gone kept refrigeration breakfast days lovely cafe road relief hotel food staff unfriendly impolite recommened staying situated dangerous poor hotel choose rated star ones
